name: The Flow Of Time
description:
The game is about a dryad who is able to change the flow of time, thus making certain objects in the level shrink and grow. With those abilities you have to progress your way through the level.

Controls (best played with a gamepad):

  • WASD /Left Thumb Stick to move 
  • SPACE / A to jump
  • Use Lb / Q to shrink objects
  • Use Rb / E to make objects grow

Try to keep the timebar in the left bottom corner in balance and try to make it to the end of the game.

List of used assets:

  • Female Mannequin Character
  • Megascans Wood Texture for Main Character
  • Immersive Dark Ambient Music
  • Interactive Stylized Lowply Grass
  • Rock Texture by Peter Larsen

Link to gameplay video:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6Rh6vVy93cg
